title: Dragon Quest: Seirei Rubis Densetsu
original_name: ドラゴンクエスト　精霊ルビス伝説
sinopse: The story illustrates the travels of Fairy Rubis before the creaton of Alefgard. Although the story does not contain most of the key features of the game series of Dragon Quest, Enix has declared that this story follows the official historical background setting of the Dragon Quest series.
